channel.title: Converting to PI

item.title: Converting to PI
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“wannaflyhi, post:1, topic:432772”]How would i convert this to PI? its from a Czaar source

} else if (itemUsed == 15187 && useWith == 1540) {
if (playerLevel[13] >= 130) {
deleteItem(1540, getItemSlot(1540), 1);
deleteItem(15187, getItemSlot(15187), 1);
addItem(15185, 1);
addSkillXP((120 * playerLevel[13]), 13);
setAnimation(0x378);
actionTimer = 15;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
} else {
sendMessage(
“You need a Smithing level of 130 to make this shield.”);
}[/quote]
You already have a thread about this. You are not allowed to make more than 1 about the same issue. If you really want help you be patient and learn some things.

Read full topic
